attributes.review: First off, THIS APP GAVE ME CHLAMYDIA! and secondly, every time I open this app I’m not only greeted with a Cheeto but I also have to deal with the blatant misogyny and racism of the entire political party itself, but I got CHLAMYDIA! very sad. Not good. I just want to go back to the good old days of millennial minion memes😔😿
attributes.title: DISTGUSTING. HORRIBLE.

attributes.review: This app will change your life I was standing on my couch while my dog was talking to me and realized  that my house was gone so I was chasing it and I couldn’t catch up so then I look down and saw I was In My house 😮

attributes.review: Very underwhelming experience, poorly set up and made, not to mention it’s just ugly. Slow load time, and I have to enter a mobile number. Just no. Terrible app. Don’t get it
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: 🧚‍♂️✨💗Is there anything more to be said? Ofc there is! But this app? Horrendous. Must be taken down. So slow and controversial. This isn’t how the lord would have wanted it. The thug of this app must be stopped. When the racism starts, the civil war starts. Periodt. Buh byeeee💕✨💖
attributes.title: App of a Rapist

attributes.review: This app is honestly the worst. Firstly, I’m not vibing with the Trump theme. This would probably be a great app if it was created around 44th president of America. Aside from that though, this is really just a bland, racist, corrupt, and uninteresting app that will not be staying on my phone. 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼
attributes.title: What. An. Idiot.

attributes.review: This app worked great until the new update. Since featuring Trump’s 2020 campaign it crashes anytime I go to open the app. Uninstalling and deleting the app helped a lot.
attributes.title: New Update Crashes 24/7

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app a bunch of big orange men started to crawl out of my phone!! Running from them as we speak 🍅🍅!!! Don’t install this app or the big orange men are going to crawl out of your phone!!! 🥎
attributes.title: Hundreds of big orange men
